mapper.sql: TASK_ASSIGN_ID AS taskAssignId, TASK_ID AS taskId, ASSIGN_TYPE AS assignType, ASSIGN_REL_ID AS assignRelId, DEF_SEL_FLAG AS defSelFlag, SEL_ALL_FLAG AS selAllFlag, EXE_CONDITION AS exeCondition, CREATED_BY AS createdBy, CREATED_DT AS createdDt, UPDATED_BY AS updatedBy, UPDATED_DT AS updatedDt
mapper.select: select a.task_id, a.assign_type, a.assign_rel_id, a.def_sel_flag, a.sel_all_flag, a.exe_condition ,u.USERS_NAME as username, g.UG_UGNAME as group_name from wf_task_assign a left join USERS u on a.ASSIGN_REL_ID = u.USERS_ID and a.ASSIGN_TYPE='U' left join UG g on a.ASSIGN_REL_ID=g.UG_UGID and a.ASSIGN_TYPE='G' where a.task_id=#{taskId} order by u.USERS_NAME,g.UG_UGNAME
